Html:
Hi,

is there a way to read QR-Code with Kinect 2.0 for Windows like XBox One does or is there any sample?

can use ZXing.net library (https://zxingnet.codeplex.com/) for QR Code recognition, passing it the image frames from Kinect RGB camera

had used it at an installation project (see Triptych.Demo.WPF.ImageFolders in http://triptych.codeplex.com/) in the past and was quite happy with it
